default.content: Welcome to Thought Organizer! This is a demo version running on GitHub Pages. Note that saving is disabled in this mode.

steps.content: This is a welcome message explaining that you're using the demo version of Thought Organizer on GitHub Pages. In this mode, all data is read-only and loaded from static files.
